name: Rich Cars Remake
description:
What is Rich Cars Remake

Rich Cars Remake Is a remake of an old  flash game

                                                              Why this game

The main reason is simple I didn't  want to remake a famous flash because It is already been given loads and loads of fame.I wanted to remake a game from my childhood.          and that is all which means this is a passion project.

                                                            How old am I when making this                                                            While making a revival of the old flash game of my childhood and using the music and sound effects from the original I am 14 while doing this.

credits : Smokoko games

Music : Smokoko games     

Controls ; WASD and Arrow keys   Z= turbo   X= gear up and gear down R= recover 

P =pause
